title: New: Stay + – SCUM
body:
I don’t think anyone really knows what the hell is going on with **Stay +** / **Christian AIDS** / whatever you want to call them.

With rumours circulating about the Manchester outfit, and them choosing to remain behind a veil of secrecy, there was only one thing for them to do… um… drop a brand new song via Radio 1 DJ **Annie Mac**….?

The controversially titled _SCUM_ continues in a similar vein to _Fever_, heavy on the reverb and hugely trance influenced, it’s destined to be played through ridiculously overpriced speakers at your city’s slickest, most ‘scene’ club. Whilst the group are yet to comment on the validity of recent rumours, it appears that _SCUM_ is reasserting their belief in the **Stay +** cause.

 [Stay+ – SCUM](http://soundcloud.com/annie-mac-presents/stay-scum) by [Annie Mac Presents](http://soundcloud.com/annie-mac-presents)
